heading: Materials
text:
The rules of the New York city department of environmental protection relating to materials used in the
   construction of temporary structures for asbestos abatement activities shall contain a provision requiring such structures to be
   non-combustible or flame resistant in compliance with reference standard NFPA 255-06 or NFPA 701-99, as such standards
   may be modified by local law or by the department of buildings pursuant to applicable rules.
